column5: Looks like paradise!
It was, for sure.?
Please don't start taking about religion ?
looks like an amazing trip you both will remember for ever.

Hey guys! Had a great weekend of fishing and camping with my son this past weekend.  We camped on an island and fished , and fished...?. Bite was hot, we caught some good numbers of pike...not big ones but really feisty ones. Got in to some bass, but none was pic worthy. Perch was on, all weekend,  we got a few jumbos while we trolled for walleye.  Speaking about walleye...we caught good numbers of those, most of them in between 10 -16 inches. We got keepers also, 2 nice walleye, 19 and 22 inches . Trolling was the key, but one if the keepers was caught on a lure in less than 10 ft of water...was a great weekend for sure. Cheers! Gino
Sounds like an outstanding trip for you guys and great pictures. The West Bay is one of my favorite places in this entire universe !!
That was sunrise 3 days in the row...absolutely amazing ?
Yes! Agree...we love west bay, awesome place. Nice camping spots and fish everywhere. ?

You are the Dad of the summer of 2019. I would have killed to spend that kind of time when I was your boy's age. Do me a favour, wear shoes on a boat. Nothing worse than spoiling that kind of weekend than to have to go into North Bay to remove a hook buried in a foot.

I keep forgetting about wearing shoes in the boat. Funny thing(...not funny for me) that actually happened to me in 2013. I was fishing Parry Sound area , got really early in the boat and I forgot a rod on the bottom of the boat, with a lure attached to line...next thing, I got a hook in my foot...had to go to emergency to cut it and get a shot. Thanks for reminding me, I should have learned by now...??
Very Nice trip Gino thank you for sharing the adventure with us.  Art
Thank you , sir! It was a perfect weekend ?
Great pics!
Looks like fun!  I’ll be in South Bay area for a week starting next Saturday.  Can’t wait!!

You are a God for giving that young lad an everlasting memory!  Don't be getting a big head and start with the Godfather lines - that's a demotion from what ya earned!  Seriously, I envy you what you have shared with your son, do it often!  Michael

Envious you had the chance to do this! Can't wait for my kids to be that age. I feel like the fishing has improved in West Bay. Not many reports from that area, but it seems to be picking up. @Old Ironmaker our hospital has a dedicated fish removal station. I saw it when I went in for ehmm... cough... a fever.

Thank you! My son really enjoys going outdoors.  For the last 3 years we had at least 1-2 weekends of camping + fishing  and we already planned for next year. One more (long) weekend of fishing coming up ....Algoma , in September ????
Oh, yeah...a week of fishing...awesome!!!??

Yes, the fishing definitely improved,  but keep in mind Nipissing is a fish factory...such an amazing lake that has potential to rebound because of the fantastic forage. It looked like everywhere we throw a lure there was some sort of fish...definitely a place to take kids and youngsters,  they won't get bored and plenty of islands to camp.?
no better way to spend time with your son ... great report !!!!
some fantastic photos!
Well, that story makes me want to do a trip to West Bay! Thanks for sharing and passing the amazing past time of fishing on to your son.

Better hook removal faculty than in Buffalo area. My Uncle in North Tonawanda goes to the local Vets to have hooks removed from his arse, more than once. I witnessed it. Is the West Arm of Nipp the same as the west bay? Way back my inlaws cottage was on Bear Creek and we fished the South Bay and locals called it the west bay too.
Good on you for putting that trip together! You have your priorities firmly in order and your son will remember it forever. And yeah, awesome pics and the sunrise is beautiful!!

We just had some amazing sunrises and sunsets...would be a shame if I didn't took a few shots. And, yes...I agree with you grimsbylander, he for sure will remember this way more that any video games he plays...????
Now thats a trip to remember!
I hope you gave him double video game time to make up for this trip  Good stuff Gino.
great pics, lovely scenery, great memories, thanks for the share !
